findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized upgrade of its script.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected Constructor
findings.description: The constructor of the contract is public and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Receive Ether
findings.description: The smart contract has a receive ether function that allows it to receive Ether.

findings.title: setMoveBnbToWallets
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has potential vulnerabilities due to lack of access control or input validation.

findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential unauthorized token transfer due to lack of access control.

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: decreaseAllowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function has a potential vulnerability as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The editExcludedFromFees function allows the owner to edit excluded addresses from fees.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function does not properly handle fees, potentially leading to incorrect calculations.

findings.title: setSwap
findings.description: The setSwap function has onlyOwner access control, which may lead to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: setFees
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: setReflectionFee
findings.description: The setReflectionFee function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: setBuybackFee
findings.description: The setBuybackFee function has been identified as a potential security risk.

findings.title: setLiquidityFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: setMarketingFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: setMaxTxPercent
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max transaction %. The smart contract owner can change the value to “zero”. No threshold set.
